p: The extracts from fine powder of lyophilized dried sample were obtained using the validated green extraction method designed for the extraction of rosmarinic acid derivatives from Lamiaceae [ 55]. Shortly, the extraction consisted in S/M ratio of 25:1 mL/g DW mixed with 20 mL of pure ethanol (100%) as the extraction solvent extracted during 45 min in an ultrasound bath (USC1200TH, Prolabo, Sion, Switzerland) with operating at an ultrasound frequency of 30 kHz with extraction temperature set at 45 °C. After extraction, centrifugation was carried out for 15 min at 8000× g, and the resulting supernatant filtered (0.45 µm, Merck, Saint-Quentin-Fallavier, Lyon, France) prior to further analysis.
